# Newsroom AI

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-ad
  width="100"
  height="283"
  type="nws"
  layout="responsive"
  src="https://tags.nws.ai/{id}/"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, please [contact Newsroom AI](https://www.nws.ai).

Supported parameters:

-   `src`
